trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Leawood
There were no other sightings in Leawood on or around August 19th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying in my back yard reading a book while sun tanning. I looked straight up and saw this bean very high in the sky with white lights that came on and off in no specific sequence. At first, I thought it must have been a glare from my sun glasses but when I removed them the object was still there. I then got up to look at the object from a different perspective and it remained at the same hovering spot. Because it was at a great height, I could not guess as to the length but I would say it was as long as a 737 airplane. The beam was not cigar shaped, rather more rectangular. I eventually when back to my reading and when I glanced up, it was gone.
